title: 2/28/18 - Mark Levin Audio Rewind
description:
On Wednesday's Mark Levin show, Ben Ferguson of WREC in Memphis, Tennessee fills in for Mark. The media is reporting that President Trump is shockingly supporting Barack Obama’s gun control ideas. The media wants us to freak out, have a big fight on th...
